column2:
My liege,

Surely you know the extent of my influence in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. How is it then, that you deprive me of my right to be on your council! I demand that I be granted a council position.

Signed,
[lmmpvf_demander.GetTitledName]
Grant a position immediately
Promise to grant soon
No, and don't bother me for another 5 years!
Refuse

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your demand is most just. Of course you deserve a position on my council. Henceforth, you shall hold the prestigious duty of the realm's [Root.GetJobTitle].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your demand is most just. However, I need some more time to take care of a few affairs. Rest assured that I will grant you a council position as soon as possible!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetFirstName],

In light of the current circumstances it would not be in the best interests of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to grant you a council position. Perhaps some other day I shall be inclined to reconsider your demand.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetFirstName],

In light of the current and foreseeable circumstances it would not be in the best interests of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to grant you a council position. Please wait and see how the situation develops in the next 5 years.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

It has been a long time since I demanded that my liege, [Liege.GetFirstName], should grant me a position on [Liege.GetHerHis] council. However, [Liege.GetSheHe] has so far not complied with my demand.
Send [Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] a reminder
Give up

My liege,

It has been a long time since you promised to grant me a position on the council. I now demand that you uphold your word and grant me a position immediately.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Grant a position
Refuse

My liege,

I, and the members of my faction, are pleased that you have granted me my rightful position on your council.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,

It grieves me deeply that you hold members of my family prisoner. Surely, you know of the nobility of my house and the extent of my influence in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I demand that you release my family immediately.

Signed,
[lmmpvf_demander.GetTitledName]
Release [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s family from prison
Refuse

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your demand is most just. I am sorry that your family had to go through this hardship. I will have ordered the release of all of your family members.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

Although it pains me that your loved ones are in prison, it must be kept so for the greater good of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. I hope you will understand.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
